trans-unit.source: Printing and Reporting (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Imprimir y crear informes (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] offers several options for printing and reporting.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]ofrece varias opciones para imprimir y crear informes.

trans-unit.source: The following topics provide overviews and links to the relevant documentation related to printing and reporting.
trans-unit.target: Los temas siguientes proporcionan información general y vínculos a la documentación pertinente relacionada con imprimir y crear informes.

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview of the `PrintForm` component that enables printing the contents of a form.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una visión general de la `PrintForm` componente que permite imprimir el contenido de un formulario.

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print a scrollable form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explica cómo imprimir un formulario desplazable mediante el `PrintForm` componente.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print Client and Non-Client Areas of a Form](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-client-and-non-client-areas-of-a-form.md)
trans-unit.target: [Imprimir áreas de cliente y áreas que no son de cliente de un formulario](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-client-and-non-client-areas-of-a-form.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print both the client and non-client areas of a form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explica cómo imprimir el cliente y el cliente no son áreas de un formulario mediante la `PrintForm` componente.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print the Client Area of a Form](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-the-client-area-of-a-form.md)
trans-unit.target: [Imprimir el área de cliente de un formulario](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-the-client-area-of-a-form.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains how to print the client area of a form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explica cómo imprimir el área cliente de un formulario mediante la `PrintForm` componente.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Print a Form by Using the PrintForm Component](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/how-to-print-a-form-by-using-the-printform-component.md)
Explains how to print a basic form by using the `PrintForm` component.
trans-unit.target: Explica cómo imprimir un formulario básico mediante el `PrintForm` componente.
[Implementación de aplicaciones que hacen referencia al componente PrintForm](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/deploying-applications-that-reference-the-printform-component.md)

trans-unit.source: Discusses how to deploy the `PrintForm` component together with an application.
trans-unit.target: Describe cómo implementar el `PrintForm` componente junto con una aplicación.
[Adición de informes imprimibles a aplicaciones de Visual Studio](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/printing/adding-printable-reports-to-visual-studio-applications.md)

trans-unit.source: Discusses options available for writing reports.
trans-unit.target: Describe las opciones disponibles para escribir informes.
